Posts.Content: August 4 - Leo - *RAWR* My hair has JUST begun to make an appearance (although the mustache and chin hairs came back with a vengance weeks ago!) I hope I have some of my 'mane' back by my birthday. I read somewhere (and of course NOW I can't remember WHERE I read it) that more babies are born in August than any other month, but all you February girls might be able to prove that statistic wrong. Here's to wishing all of us many, many more birthdays!
Posts.Title: When is your Birthday?
